snippet: Letgo, which operates a smartphone-focused market for secondhand goods, has raised $100 million in financing.
abstract: DealBook Online; start-up Letgo says it has raised $100 million in first round of venture capital financing.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Letgo, which operates a smartphone-focused market for secondhand goods, has raised $100 million in financing.

headline.main: South Africa’s Naspers Backs Smartphone Start-Up Letgo
